tests.title: should retrieve a list of all Star Wars characters
tests.fullTitle: Star Wars API Tests should retrieve a list of all Star Wars characters
tests.code:
const characters = await makeRequest(`${swapiUrl}/people`);
assert.ok(characters.results && characters.results.length > 0, 'No characters returned');
